metadata.title: CVE-2024-10466 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: By sending a specially crafted push message, a remote server could havehung the parent process, causing the browser to become unresponsive. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 132, Firefox ESR < 128.4, Thunderbird <128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
